Description: Nine's Quirk, Weather Manipulation, let him to control the weather; allowing him to instantly cause powerful thunderstorms and tornadoes. However, his Quirk was too powerful for him to wield and it resulted in the destruction of his body's cellular tissue. Nine's second Quirk is a weaker duplicate of All For One, with which he can steal and hold up to eight different Quirks. He obtained it through a surgical transplant by Daruma Ujiko.
